item.description: Bring copies of recent magazines and books (e.g., I'm bringing my copy of Stephen Sturgeon's "Trees of the Twentieth Century"), and your laptops and notebooks for writing or revision, and printouts for discussion. This'll be a working brunch, but a fun kind of work. A very open-ended format; and very suitable for new members, who'd like to chat for a good long while with people already long involved in Boston's literary goings-on.
item.why: Because sometimes Fridays just aren't enough.
item.name: Sunday Literary Brunch
